title: Recent advances in chemical biology tools for protein and RNA profiling of extracellular vesicles
content:
RSC Chem. Biol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3CB00200D, Review Article
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Woojeong Lim, Soyeon Lee, Minseob Koh, Ala Jo, Jongmin Park
This review provides an overview of how chemical biology tools have been applied for efficient EV isolation, the increment of EV detection sensitivity, multiplexed analysis of EV protein, metabolic labeling of EVs, and drug occupancy of EV proteins.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
